emuInput.TitMainTitle: Gospel Singers Of Clairton, including woman wearing eyeglasses and bead necklace, singing in microphone, in Calvary Baptist Church for All Night Gospel Sing for the Charles "Buggsy" Drafts Fund
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 18, 1962, pg. 1 reads: "All-Night Gospel Sing For Drafts Fund- The Gospel Singers of Clairton are shown as they rocked with the "soul" music in benefit performance for the Charles Drafts fund."
